channel.title: news on Franck Cornu
channel.description: Recent content in news on Franck Cornu

item.title: Programmatically synchronize content types to a site from content type hub
item.description: The new SharePoint Online content type hub is a really geat feature to ensure a standardized information architecture across the company. Compared to the previous version, a lot of improvements has been made, especially the synchronization process with consumer sites which is now much faster and convenient. However, to be able to add content types in a library or list coming from the hub in a specific SharePoint site, you must first synchronize them.

item.title: New year, new blog!
item.description: Remember thecollaborationcorner.com? Wel…it’s been quite a while since my last blog post. Actually I closed my previous blog (thecollaborationcorner.com) almost 3 years ago due to a lack of time and motivation. After a quite busy period for me since the last two past years (two new born in 3 years!), I finally decided to go forward and open a blog again, but this time using cool new tools.

item.title: PnP Modern Search course is now available!
item.description: Finally. It’s been a while I wanted to create this content but now it is live! I’m glad to announce I’ve released a complete course about usage and configuration for the PnP Modern Search solution. This course arrives with the latest 4.5.4 version and should help you to use the solution at its full potential.
